[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpz26kbn2y[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDuring a libFuzzer run on the Mongoose codebase, AddressSanitizer reported a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone-byte read was performed immediately past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated by the fuzz harness, causing the process to abort.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type:  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  AddressSanitizer detected a heap-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mout-of-bounds read of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- What happened:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The fuzzing harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer and populates it with fuzzer-provided data.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. That buffer is passed into the internal TCP/IP stack via a call to [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Inside `mg_tcpip_rx`, execution eventually reaches `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. In `rx_icmp`, code at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m reads one byte at an address just beyond the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend of the allocated packet buffer, triggering a heap-buffer-overflow.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations:  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow is a single-byte read located exactly [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The buffer was allocated in the fuzz harness; the overflow occurs in production[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, not in the harness itself.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The crash stack frames:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    - `rx_icmp` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → libFuzzer internals.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • AddressSanitizer’s shadow memory shows the out-of-bounds byte was in the heap [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredzone.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas for investigation:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `rx_icmp` in `src/net_builtin.c`, around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m—particularly how packet data [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength is computed and how indexing into the packet buffer is guarded.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The caller `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m897[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to see how it [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprepares or validates the `pkt` structure before dispatch.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The packet allocation and initialization in the fuzz driver [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`test/fuzz.c`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maround line [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to understand how packet length and contents are passed to the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTCP/IP routines.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Definitions of the `pkt` structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket buffers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and any length fields or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheaders used by the ICMP handler.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy examining these parts, one can gain a holistic view of how untrusted input flows[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom the fuzz harness into ICMP processing and where bounds checks may be missing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor insufficient.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m851[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m852[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of Root Cause:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv4 ICMP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp` in src/net_builtin.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m assumes that the ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader is present and that `pkt->pay.buf` points to valid payload bytes. However, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munlike the IPv6 handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it never checks that the packet length actually[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcovers a full ICMP header before proceeding. When fuzzer-provided data is too short[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., only Ethernet + IP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, this leads to an out-of-bounds read in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubsequent `memcpy`.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Location:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File: src/net_builtin.c[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Function: static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately inside the existing `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&& [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m … [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m` block, before computing `hlen`.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Steps:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Insert a length check mirroring the IPv6 handler’s guard. After the `if [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m` line, add:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure full ICMP header is present before reading payload *[0m[35m/[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Leave the rest of the logic unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcomputing `hlen`, `space`, `plen`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocating reply, zeroing header, copying payload, checksumming, and output[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Critical Logic:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing echo-reply behavior remains intact for well-formed ICMP echo [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequests.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to harness, tests, external libraries, or utility functions.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzing logic and API entry points are unmodified, so regression tests and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mseed corpora remain valid.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This single-line guard is the minimal fix that closes the OOB window by [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensuring the packet has at least `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` bytes following the IP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It directly parallels the safe pattern in `rx_ip6` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich already checks [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before proceeding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It prevents any path in `rx_icmp` from dereferencing or copying past the end [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof the buffer for truncated or malicious ICMP packets.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigations:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Truncated echo requests [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmissing part of ICMP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will now be ignored [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrather than processed; this is acceptable since they are malformed.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No impact on non-ICMP or non-echo-ping traffic.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No additional performance impact: a single integer comparison is negligible in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket-processing workloads.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Verification:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After patching, re-run the libFuzzer harness and AddressSanitizer to confirm [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the heap-buffer-overflow no longer reproduces.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit and integration tests to ensure no regressions in legitimate[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP functionality.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy following this strategy, we eliminate the ASan-detected out-of-bounds read in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` with a minimal, targeted addition, preserving all existing functionality [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand fuzzing coverage.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:45:22][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=573292;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=802396;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m2[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m[12/29/25 20:47:36][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=900049;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=719413;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m          static void [1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1m([0mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[1m)[0m [1m{[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpz26kbn2y[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The fuzzer input leads to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mjust past the end of an allocated buffer backing `pkt->pay`, triggering a crash [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen reading `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to `rx_icmp` that checks `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand returns early, placed after the existing `pkt->icmp->type` access. After [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same overflow is still reported at the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame code location.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Crasher log shows:  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow on `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * The invalid read is of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated by the fuzzer harness.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * The backtrace:  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `rx_icmp`  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. LibFuzzer driver  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Shadow bytes from ASan reveal the overflow is in the heap redzone right after [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe packet payload buffer.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash point [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m dereferences data beyond the allocated [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay` buffer.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File modified: `src/net_builtin.c`  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Context around the change:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          return;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new guard checks that `pkt->pay.len` is at least the size of the ICMP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader before proceeding with payload handling.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Post-Patch Result  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The same AddressSanitizer overflow is raised in `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m after [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash stack trace and memory addresses are effectively identical to the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitial run, indicating the check did not prevent the out-of-bounds access.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Further Investigation Areas  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The order of operations in `rx_icmp`: the patch guard runs after the read of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`, so the initial dereference remains unprotected.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The definition and initialization of `pkt->icmp` and `pkt->pay` in the packet [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparser or allocator—how the buffer sizes and pointers are established.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code paths in `mg_tcpip_rx` that lead to invoking `rx_icmp`, especially [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maround packet length calculations and pointer validity.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The structure layouts [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`struct pkt`, `struct icmp`, `struct ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to verify [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader offsets and ensure bounds checks cover every field access.[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap‐buffer‐overflow is triggered by the unguarded dereference of [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->icmp->type inside rx_icmp, before any bounds check.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Although rx_ip performs a “pay.len ≥ [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m” check before calling[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrx_icmp, that check happens on the original payload pointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mimmediately after the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Then mkpay is called [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshifting pay.buf to just past the ICMP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand pay.len is reduced by the header size. By the time we enter rx_icmp, pay.len no[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger reflects whether the ICMP header itself is entirely in-bounds—so relying on [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpay.len inside rx_icmp is too late.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Attackers can craft packets that pass the rx_ip guard [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., by setting bogus [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP header lengths or version‐bits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, causing mkpay to compute an out-of-bounds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer for pkt->icmp. The first access, pkt->icmp->type, then reads past the end [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof the allocated buffer.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Outline  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In rx_icmp, *before* any access of pkt->icmp or its fields, verify that the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header lies fully within the raw packet buffer:  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute the byte‐offset of the ICMP header within the raw buffer:  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          offset = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If pkt->raw.len < offset + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, return immediately.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      This guarantee ensures that pkt->icmp->type and the rest of the ICMP header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare never read or written out-of-bounds.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Move or remove the existing “payload‐length” guard that was inserted after [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe type dereference; ensure any remaining checks in rx_icmp guard only the *data* [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat follows the ICMP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mused when echoing payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional enhancement[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In the IP dispatcher [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore mkpay for IP options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidate that the declared IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m4[0m[39m*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mver&[0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m fits within the raw [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, to prevent mkpay for IP options from computing an invalid pointer.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Step-by-Step Implementation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In net_builtin.c, locate static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m382[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Immediately at function entry, insert:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t icmp_offset = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < icmp_offset + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not enough data for a complete ICMP header[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After that guard, it is safe to read pkt->icmp->type.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Retain the existing logic that checks for [0m[33mtype[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho request[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, matching IP [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdst, and then calculates the reply.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure that any “pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m” test in rx_icmp is either [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremoved [0m[1;39m([0m[39msince we do not re-parse the header here[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or relocated inside the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing block if it is intended to guard the *payload* after the ICMP header.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In the IP preprocessing [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/net_builtin.c around line [0m[1;36m885[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, after [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecoding the IP header length from pkt->ip->ver, add:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t ip_hdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     This prevents mkpay on a bogus IP header length.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By checking the raw buffer length against the absolute location and size of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP header, we guarantee memory safety *before* any dereference.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We preserve existing ICMP echo-reply logic—packets that genuinely contain a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull IP header plus ICMP header and payload will still be processed and echoed.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed or truncated packets are now dropped early and harmlessly, without [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcrashing or leaking memory.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No external or harness code is modified; fuzzing behavior remains identical. [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mExisting tests and packet flows are unaffected except that crashes no longer occur.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigations  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Some deeply malformed packets that previously might have partially processed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill now be silently dropped. In practice, dropping ICMP echo requests that lack a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull header is acceptable.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The optional IP-header‐length check further strengthens parsing robustness and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguards against malicious IP options fields.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Verification  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild with AddressSanitizer and rerun the same fuzz input; the [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow at rx_icmp:[0m[1;36m385[0m[39m should disappear.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests [0m[35m/[0m[39m integration tests to confirm no regressions in ICMP [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mecho functionality.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally add a small corpus entry: a truly minimal ICMP echo request [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mEthernet + IP + ICMP header + payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and a truncated ICMP byte sequence, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massert both paths.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:48:02][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=331776;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=491943;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m3[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us and validate IHL[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t total_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > total_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt.raw.len = total_len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated after [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustment[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpz26kbn2y[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report indicates a one-byte heap-buffer overflow in the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when fuzzing the IPv4/ICMP handling code[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith a minimal packet buffer of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes. The fuzzer’s test harness allocates a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmall buffer and invokes `mg_tcpip_rx`, which eventually calls `rx_icmp`, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggering an out-of-bounds read beyond `pkt->raw.buf`.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to guard against truncated ICMP headers by computing [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`icmp_offset` and returning early if `pkt->raw.len` is too small, and similar [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength checks were added around the IPv4 header parsing in `mg_tcpip_rx`. After [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrebuilding and rerunning the same fuzz testcase [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m times, the same [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same location in `rx_icmp` still occurs. The log [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremains identical, indicating that the additional bounds checks did not prevent the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvalid read.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer initializes a packet buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m of length [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes via [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`malloc`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `mg_tcpip_rx` parses Ethernet and IP headers, then hands off to `rx_icmp` when an[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP packet is detected.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, the code accesses `pkt->icmp->type` without verifying that the ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader lies entirely within `pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read overflow at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the allocated region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, before accessing `pkt->icmp`, the patch computes:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    icmp_offset = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp – [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  and checks  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < icmp_offset + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `mg_tcpip_rx`, the patch groups the IP header length check into a block:  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    size_t ip_hdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  then chooses `mkpay` based on whether IPv4 options are present.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLog after patch  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzz run log shows the same ASan failure signature in `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The read still occurs just past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Allocation stack in LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput and the crash stack are identical to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe initial report.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Bounds and offset computation for `pkt->icmp` relative to `pkt->raw.buf` in all [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode paths leading into `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Upstream packet length validation in `mg_tcpip_rx` or higher-level dispatch [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions to ensure the entire ICMP header is present before `rx_icmp` is called.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and initialization of `pkt->icmp` and `pkt->raw.len` in the `pkt` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructure, to confirm that `pkt->icmp` always points within `pkt->raw.buf`.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between `mkpay`, packet trimming, and how `pkt->icmp` is [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mset—especially for small or malformed IP payloads.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any additional uses of header length fields [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip->ver`, `ip->ihl`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that affect [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer arithmetic without explicit checks against the provided buffer length.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
