[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe initialization of pkt->icmp:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. In the IPv4 packet parsing block [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, restore precise IHL-based [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer arithmetic when calling mkpay:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Retain the existing IHL detection: size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Check that ihl is between [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m and pkt.raw.len - [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m before [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalling mkpay.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Call [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m unconditionally, without a separate [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch for ihl > [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. In rx_ip [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe IP dispatch function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, after calling mkpay, set pkt->icmp to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.pay.buf when pkt.ip->proto == IPPROTO_ICMP, but only if [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt.pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. This ensures pkt->icmp always lies within [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds of the payload.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strengthen rx_icmp’s entry guard:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the existing icmp_offset computation-and-check with a direct check on [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->pay.len:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Then, set pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Use pkt->pay.len to verify the ICMP header fits, rather than raw.len minus [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset. This avoids underflows if pkt->icmp was previously mis-initialized.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensure consistent header truncation in mg_tcpip_rx:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After reading pkt.ip->len from the IP header, enforce:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.raw.len = total_len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     This tightens the relation between raw.len and the header pointers.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preserve existing logic:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Do not modify harness or fuzzing code.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Do not catch broader errors.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Preserve mkpay’s signature and usage for non-IP packets.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Step-by-step patch approach:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. In mg_tcpip_rx, replace lines [0m[1;36m888[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m894[0m[39m:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. In rx_ip, after determining ICMP protocol:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->proto == IPPROTO_ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.pay.buf;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. In rx_icmp, simplify entry check:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* pkt->icmp is guaranteed valid *[0m[35m/[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m existing ICMP echo type handling[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Justification:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By centralizing payload bounds checks in rx_ip and mg_tcpip_rx, we avoid [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderflow-induced large pay.len values.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using pkt->pay.len [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcomputed safely by mkpay with validated pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to guard [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstruct icmp accesses prevents [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overreads.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Restoring precise IHL-based payload pointer computation eliminates dangling [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls from malformed IHL values.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Potential side effects and mitigation:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ICMP parsing now only happens when pkt.pay.len ≥ [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, possibly[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdropping some malformed or truncated ICMP frames. This is acceptable because we [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust not read beyond packet boundary.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other protocols using payload must still be guarded separately; ensure mkpay [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis only called with validated offsets in their respective branches.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m. Reference:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv6 parsing in rx_ip6 uses a similar pattern: it checks payload length before[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader casting. Mirror that logic for IPv4/ICMP.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      size_t total_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > total_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        pkt.raw.len = total_len;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated after [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustment[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDEDUP_TOKEN: [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m__interceptor_malloc--LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput--fuzzer::Fuzzer::[0m[1;35mExecuteCallback[0m[1;39m([0m[39munsig[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpz26kbn2y[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was reported in function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when the fuzzing harness drove the ICMP packet handling path. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs on a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past the end of a dynamically allocated [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. A patch was attempted that adds a length check before casting into the ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader and tightens IP header length and IHL validation in the Ethernet→IP [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing path. After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` still manifests.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer runs `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c`, which allocates a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt` buffer, populates it via `mg_tcpip_rx`, and ultimately invokes `rx_icmp`.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap region [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m when accessing `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack [0m[1;39m([0m[39mabridged[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` →  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `mg_tcpip_rx` →  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → libFuzzer internals → `main`.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow happens at offset [0m[1;36m0x22[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from the start of the buffer, exactly[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the boundary of the allocated block.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m381[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Added `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;` before using [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Initialized `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the Ethernet→IP dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m882[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Replaced ad-hoc truncation logic with a scoped block that computes:  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       – `ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       – `total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       – Validates `ihl` is at least `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and within `total_len`.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       – Adjusts `pkt.raw.len` down to `total_len` if larger.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       – Checks for truncation once more, then calls `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch is intended to prevent buffer overruns on truncated or malformed [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP/ICMP packets.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding with the above changes and rerunning the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39miterations, the same heap-buffer-overflow at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m is reported.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ASan log indicates an identical one-byte read past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region, with [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same call chain into `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new sanitizer findings appear; the overflow persists unmitigated.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The bounds and contents of `pkt->pay` at the moment `rx_icmp` is invoked, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincluding how `mkpay` populates `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf`.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validation of `pkt->pay.len` relative to the actual packet buffer size [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The transition from Ethernet→IP→ICMP: ensure that headers are fully present [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore reading fields [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbeyond just checking `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and surrounding code that slices the packet [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload—this may under- or overestimate available data for ICMP parsing.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root‐Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap‐buffer‐overflow in rx_icmp is caused by reading pkt->icmp->type [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout guaranteeing that the ICMP header bytes actually reside in the allocated [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The existing mkpay-based slicing and the [0m[33mproto[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch in rx_ip are [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmisaligned:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • rx_ip always sets pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ignoring IPv4 [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m shifts pay.buf to after the ICMP header, so [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdownstream rx_icmp erroneously reassigns pkt->icmp = pay.buf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpointing into [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, losing the true header location.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The length check in rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m only tests [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload length minus header, not the presence of the header itself, and can be [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbypassed if pay.len underflows or is otherwise incorrect.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. High‐Level Fix[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In the IPv4 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mEthernet→IP→rx_ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Compute the IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Before slicing:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Verify the buffer contains at least eth + ihl bytes for the IP header.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Compute the full ICMP header offset = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl + [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – If pkt->raw.len < that offset, return [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtruncated ICMP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Set pkt->icmp to point at the ICMP header location:  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           struct icmp *icmph = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           pkt->icmp = icmph;  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Slice the payload to everything after the ICMP header:  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmph + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmph[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Call [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP handling[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Remove the override that set pkt->icmp = pkt->pay.buf. Instead, rely on [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->icmp already pointing at the header from rx_ip.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Drop the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`; header presence [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas guaranteed by rx_ip.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Optionally add an assert/guard to be extra‐safe:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Proceed with reading pkt->icmp->type, confident the header lies within the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Revert the last‐attempt lines in rx_icmp that override pkt->icmp and perform [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the rx_ip function, replace the [0m[33mproto[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m block [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m797[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m807[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t hdr_off = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t icmp_hdr_end = hdr_off + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < icmp_hdr_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m ICMP header truncated[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct icmp *icmph = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = icmph;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmph + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmph[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Payload after ICMP header[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Leave the improved Ethernet→IP IHL and total_len logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom the previous [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m intact to guarantee raw.len is properly clamped.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By validating `pkt->raw.len >= eth+ihl+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, we ensure no header‐only[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes are read out of bounds.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Computing pkt->icmp using the actual IHL handles IPv4 options correctly.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - mkpay is now always passed a pointer within [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw.buf, raw.buf+raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, so [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpay.len cannot underflow or overflow.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - rx_icmp regains a correct header pointer, and reading `pkt->icmp->type` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocol paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mUDP, TCP, ARP, IPv6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are unchanged.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ethernet→IP truncation, IHL checks, and mkpay semantics are preserved.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Tests and the fuzzer harness do not require alterations; entry‐points and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction signatures remain the same.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side‐Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Strictly tighter on malformed/truncated ICMP: some packets previously [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m“silently” processed may now be dropped earlier. This is intended—malformed headers[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould not be parsed.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No impact on performance in the happy‐path, as the checks are minimal integer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomparisons.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After patch, re-run existing unit tests and the fuzzer to ensure coverage and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mno regressions.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. References[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar header‐presence checks already in Ethernet→IP dispatch ensure safe [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmkpay usage.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The reworked [0m[33mproto[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m block mirrors the pattern used for IPv6 or other [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength‐prefixed protocols.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:55:13][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=249541;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=663533;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:58:28][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.ANALYZE -> TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m                     ]8;id=506341;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=679588;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 21:01:17][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=55766;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=381684;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                       ]8;id=373049;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=527839;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\
[2;36m[12/29/25 21:01:18][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Took [1;36m1.01[0m seconds;              ]8;id=530312;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=278814;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m

[2;36m                    [0m            [35m/[0m[35m/[0m [1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1m([0m[1m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m, [1m([0mint[1m)[0m len[1m)[0m[1m)[0m;                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m            if [1m([0mpkt->icmp->type == [1;36m8[0m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[1m)[0m [1m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-799[0m,[1;36m9[0m +[1;36m803[0m,[1;36m11[0m @@                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m              struct mg_connection *c = [1;35mgetpeer[0m[1m([0mifp->mgr, pkt, false[1m)[0m;                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m              if [1m([0mc[1m)[0m [1;35mmg_error[0m[1m([0mc, [32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1m)[0m;                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m            [1m}[0m else if [1m([0mpkt->ip->proto == [1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -    pkt->icmp = [1m([0mstruct icmp *[1m)[0m [1m([0mpkt->ip + [1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m;                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -    if [1m([0mpkt->pay.len [1m<[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Advance to ICMP payload[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpz26kbn2y[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was detected in function `rx_icmp` in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.c` when a fuzzed packet input was processed. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer log shows a one‐byte read just past an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region. To address [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis, the patch attempt introduces explicit bounds checks for the IP header length [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and ICMP header region before invoking `rx_icmp`, and refines how the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP‐payload pointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is set for both ICMP and generic IP packets. Despite [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthese changes, the same overflow in `rx_icmp` persists under fuzz testing.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer’s `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` harness allocates a buffer from the fuzz [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput and calls `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- During packet processing, when `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, code casts `pkt->ip [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` to `struct icmp *` without validating that the buffer actually contains a full[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a one‐byte read past [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of the allocated packet buffer occurs, triggering ASan’s [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ASan report identifies the overflow address immediately after the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion allocated by `malloc` in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the ICMP branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the patch computes:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `ihl` = IP header length in bytes  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `hdr_off` = Ethernet header size + IP header length  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `icmp_hdr_end` = `hdr_off` + size of `struct icmp`  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It adds a guard `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < icmp_hdr_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;` to skip truncated ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- It then sets `pkt->icmp` to point at `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl`, calls `mkpay` with [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe payload start, and invokes `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IPv4 branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`eth->type == [0m[1;36m0x800[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the patch similarly rechecks IHL [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidity, truncates `pkt.raw.len` to the frame’s total length, and sets the payload[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `mkpay` at `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl`.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult After Patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fresh fuzz run with `-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m` reproduces the same heap‐buffer‐overflow at [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ASan diagnostics, stack trace, and heap region layout are identical to the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitial report, indicating that the new bounds checks did not prevent the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds read.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, start_ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and how it computes `pkt->pay.len` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrelative to `pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The code in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that initializes `pkt.raw.len`, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.pay.len`, and related fields before dispatching to ICMP handlers.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The exact operations in `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m—what fields of `struct icmp` are [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccessed, and whether additional length or field validity checks are required.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The handling of malformed or minimal‐length packets in the fuzz harness [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically how much data is allocated and whether the harness [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly simulates Ethernet + IP headers.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any shared logic for buffer truncation or redzone management that could cause [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.raw.len` to misrepresent the actual buffer size available to ICMP processing.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
