[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:806[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m814[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m807[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m811[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The persistence of the heap‐buffer‐overflow in `rx_icmp` indicates that the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting bounds checks neither fully prevent out‐of‐bounds header access nor [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly compute the ICMP payload region under all conditions. Our strategy is to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcentralize and harden boundary management via `mkpay`, then simplify and correct [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP branch in `rx_ip` and add a final sanity check in `rx_icmp`. This [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39machieves:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uniform pointer/length calculations [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno wrap‐around or underflow[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Single, authoritative payload offset set by `mkpay`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Simple, robust header‐size checks before any field access  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patching `mkpay`  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The current `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` does not guard against `ptr` beyond the buffer, so[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` may underflow to a huge value, bypassing later checks. We will [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodify `mkpay` to:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamp `ptr` into `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw.ptr, raw.ptr + raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If `ptr` is out‐of‐bounds, set `pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m` and `pay.ptr = raw.ptr + raw.len`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This prevents uncontrolled wrap‐around and ensures any subsequent `pay.len` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck will fail safely.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Steps:  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Locate `mkpay` in `src/net_builtin.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit usually appears near top of file[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Rewrite it as:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *begin = pkt->raw.ptr;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *end = begin + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < begin || start > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->pay.ptr = end;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->pay.ptr = start;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->pay.len = end - start;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. This change does not alter public API or the test harness—it only tightens [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer arithmetic.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Simplify and correct the ICMP branch in `rx_ip`  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   After the IP‐layer dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx`, we position `pkt->pay.ptr` and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` at the IP payload start [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia the IPv4 branch’s `mkpay` using the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculated IHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. In `rx_ip`, we must trust those values and simply:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Check `pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Point `pkt->icmp = pkt->pay.ptr`  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Advance `pay.ptr` by `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and reduce `pay.len` accordingly  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call `rx_icmp`  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This removes manual raw‐length math here, avoids duplicating logic, and prevents[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmisaligned pointer arithmetic.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Steps:  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. In `src/net_builtin.c`, find `static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m` ICMP branch.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Replace the existing block [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich computes raw/IHL, tests `raw.len`, does its[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mown `mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m ICMP: header fits wholly in IP payload?[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.ptr;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Advance to ICMP payload[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.ptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Ensure no other code in `rx_ip` touches `pkt->raw.len` or re‐computes offsets[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor ICMP.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Add an additional guard at the start of `rx_icmp`  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   For defense in depth, we also add a minimal length check in `rx_icmp` itself [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore reading any header field:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m redundant if mkpay is correct—optional[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Or more explicitly:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.ptr + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m existing logic follows[0m[33m...[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This ensures even if some path accidentally bypasses the `rx_ip` guard, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` will not read past the end.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Validate and reapply existing IPv4 branch safeguards in `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The prior patch roughly covered:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m validate IHL, total length, adjust raw.len[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > total_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->raw.len = total_len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Ensure this stays in place. It properly clamps `raw.len` and sets `pay.ptr` for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP payload.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By centralizing boundary checks in `mkpay`, we eliminate wrap‐around of [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.len` and ensure all protocols use a correct payload region.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Simplifying `rx_ip` ICMP branch to rely solely on `pay.*` removes redundant, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror‐prone offset math and duplicates of logic from `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adding a final sanity check in `rx_icmp` closes any remaining gaps and follows[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe pattern used for UDP/TCP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*rel_hdr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing functionality is preserved: Ethernet, IPv4, UDP, TCP, DHCP, and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP processing remain fully intact.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzing logic and harness code remain unmodified. Tests for UDP/TCP are [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munaffected since their branches still use the same `mkpay` and `pay.len` checks.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Potential side‐effects & mitigation  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If any protocol handlers inadvertently relied on the old underflow behavior of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.len`, they will now bail out gracefully. In practice, only truncated packets [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare affected, and dropping them is correct behavior.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new `mkpay` guard is tightly scoped to the packet module—no global [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msemantics change or external API alterations.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing unit tests for non‐truncated packets will still pass: all valid [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets still meet `pay.len >= header_size`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m. No harness or test code changes  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   We do not touch the fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or any test files; the fixes [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare self‐contained within `src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCode ranges to be patched:  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.c:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* around mkpay definition *[0m[35m/[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m803[0m[39m  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP branch in rx_ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:380[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m395[0m[39m  [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart of rx_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
